title: Did you delete Chase Twitt's bank, which mocks people who ask "why my balance is so low? '
subtitle: The Bank created a counter-reaction to the Internet in April 2019, with a tweet that has now been deleted advising people not to take or buy coffee in order to improve low account balances.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Chase removed a tweet advising consumers to support low account balances by not taking or buying coffee.
